title: Potato, leek and cheese pie
description: This is a quick and easy take on flaky pastry. The vegetarian filling is also delicious and simple to make.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz hard vegetable fat, such as Trex, frozen for 1 hour
350g/12oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1 free-range egg, beaten for egg wash
50g/1¾oz Parmesan or vegetarian hard cheese, finely grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
